Fair Use Notice

Under Titile 17 U.S.C. Section 107, allowence is made for "Fair use" for purposes such as criticism, comment, news reporting , teaching, scholarship, and research. Fair use is permitted by copy right statute that might otherwise be infringing.Non-proit, educational or personal use,

This site is for educational purposes only

While TIM does offer other products and services such as scheduleing, budgetting and planning in terms to the "Adulting 101", Library some content had to be used from other sources, to ensure quality of our content/ research methodology we always site our sources, and try to give credit to the appropriate copy right holder whenever possible. However, sometimes mistakes can be made from time to time.So if you notice something that is factually innacurate, or if a source is not propperly cited please meassage our teamhere.
